title: Updating of checkboxes does not display busy cursor when exporting Zip
description: When exporting a Zip file, the updating of checkboxes does not display the busy cursor. This leads to confusion as it is not apparent that the checkboxes are being updated. Currently, it takes a long time (about 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table.
OB: Currently, when exporting a Zip file and updating the checkboxes, the busy cursor is not shown.
EB: The expected behavior is that when exporting a Zip file and updating the checkboxes, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the process is ongoing.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Export a Zip file 2. Observe that the updating of checkboxes does not display a busy cursor
